PostProcessor

Class SphinxBasedPostProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • PostProcessor.SphinxBasedPostProcessor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StandardRecognizer

    public class SphinxBasedPostProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
implements StandardRecognizer
    based on sphinx example modified by Johannes Twiefel

    • Constructor Detail

      • SphinxBasedPostProcessor

        public SphinxBasedPostProcessor(java.lang.String configName,
                        java.lang.String sentenceFile,
                        float languageWeight,
                        float wordInsertionProbability,
                        int substitutionMethod)
        creates a new sphinx based postprocessor
        Parameters:
        configName - name of the config. this is used as a prefix for all xml config, languague model, sentence list word list files etc.
        sentenceFile - path to list of sentences
        languageWeight - parameter used internally, but 0 here if you don't know what you are doing
        wordInsertionProbability - parameter used internally, but 0 here if you don't know what you are doing
        substitutionMethod - parameter used internally, but 0 here if you don't know what you are doing
